changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS response_messages_id_seq;

-- Response message storage CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS response_messages ( id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('response_messages_id_seq'), code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "description" VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT response_msg_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );
